comment: two-step reaction (see R01074 + R05145) R05145 and R01074 are general reactions
definition: ATP + Biotin + Apo-[methylmalonyl-CoA:pyruvate carboxytransferase] <=> AMP + Diphosphate + [Methylmalonyl-CoA:pyruvate carboxytransferase]
name: Biotin:apo[methylmalonyl-CoA:pyruvate carboxyltransferase] ligase (AMP-forming)
